price: (45) So leave them until they meet their Day in which they will be struck insensible -
arabic: فَذَرۡهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ يُلَٰقُواْ يَوۡمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِي فِيهِ يُصۡعَقُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: fadharhum ḥattā yulāqū yawmahumu alladhī fīhi yuṣ'ʿaqūna
